label: Interviewee: Hesitation, Consideration, Relating Personal Detail, Gesturing, Contextualizing

body.value: There was a...small dispute about all if I wasn't president, why should I? Well, it's because it's me. It wasn't. And I was stubborn and steadfast. I wanted to stay involved, because I was telling Frank everything that was going on. And he was kind of the guru, if you will, and a good friend, and they trusted him and he trusted me. So I would tell Frank, everything that was going on and he'd guide or make sure that we got â€“ because he had he had tentacles and connections all over the country. So he was able to help us a lot more than people realize.
